mapper.insert: INSERT into `order` ( user_name, status, create_time, update_time, version ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{status}, now(), now(), version )
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, user_name AS userName, price_total AS priceTotal FROM `order` WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND status = #{status}

SELECT f.`id`, f.`food_type` AS foodType, f.`food_name` AS foodName, f.`food_price` AS foodPrice, f.`chef_id` AS chefId, f.food_image_path AS foodImagePath, ofd.count FROM food f inner join orderFoodDetail ofd on ofd.food_id = f.id inner join `order` o on o.id = ofd.order_id where o.user_name = #{userName} and o.status = #{status}
